description: Returns group information for the specified directory. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the ListGroups.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to ListGroups. This retrieves the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the MaxResults parameter.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the group.

parameters.name: Realm
parameters.description: The domain name associated with the directory.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the group.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The group information that the request returns.

nested_items.name: GroupScope
nested_items.description: The scope of the AD group. For details, see Active Directory security groups.

nested_items.name: GroupType
nested_items.description: The AD group type. For details, see Active Directory security group type.

nested_items.name: SID
nested_items.description: The unique security identifier (SID) of the group.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An encoded paging token for paginated calls that can be passed back to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: Realm
nested_items.description: The domain name associated with the group.
